title: Goodfellas
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.

title: Dances with Wolves
oscars_won_details: Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material from Another Medium
description: Lieutenant John Dunbar, assigned to a remote western Civil War outpost, befriends wolves and Indians, making him an intolerable aberration in the military.

title: Misery
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
description: After a famous author is rescued from a car crash by a fan of his novels, he comes to realize that the care he is receiving is only the beginning of a nightmare of captivity and abuse.

title: Edward Scissorhands
description: An artificial man, who was incompletely constructed and has scissors for hands, leads a solitary life. Then one day, a suburban lady meets him and introduces him to her world.

title: Ghost
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
Best Writing, Screenplay Written Directly for the Screen
description: After a young man is murdered, his spirit stays behind to warn his lover of impending danger, with the help of a reluctant psychic.

title: Total Recall
description: When a man goes for virtual vacation memories of the planet Mars, an unexpected and harrowing series of events forces him to go to the planet for real - or does he?

title: The Hunt for Red October
description: In November 1984, the Soviet Union's best submarine captain in their newest sub violates orders and heads for the U.S. Is he trying to defect or to start a war?

title: Miller's Crossing
description: Tom Reagan, an advisor to a Prohibition-era crime boss, tries to keep the peace between warring mobs but gets caught in divided loyalties.

title: Home Alone
description: An eight-year-old troublemaker must protect his house from a pair of burglars when he is accidentally left home alone by his family during Christmas vacation.

title: Pretty Woman
description: A man in a legal but hurtful business needs an escort for some social events, and hires a beautiful prostitute he meets... only to fall in love.

title: Awakenings
description: The victims of an encephalitis epidemic many years ago have been catatonic ever since, but now a new drug offers the prospect of reviving them.

title: Jacob's Ladder
description: Mourning his dead child, a haunted Vietnam War veteran attempts to uncover his past while suffering from a severe case of dissociation. To do so, he must decipher reality and life from his own dreams, delusions, and perceptions of death.

title: Reversal of Fortune
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
description: Claus von Bülow is accused of attempting to murder his wife Sunny, leaving her in a reversible coma. He hires Alan Dershowitz for his defense.

title: The Godfather Part III
description: Follows Michael Corleone, now in his 60s, as he seeks to free his family from crime and find a suitable successor to his empire.

title: La Femme Nikita
description: Convicted felon Nikita, instead of going to jail, is given a new identity and trained, stylishly, as a top secret spy/assassin.

title: Wild at Heart
description: Young lovers Sailor and Lula run from the variety of weirdos that Lula's mom has hired to kill Sailor.

title: Cyrano de Bergerac
description: A French poet and swordsman with a large nose writes love letters for a handsome but inarticulate friend to the woman they both love.

title: Back to the Future Part III
description: Enjoying a peaceable existence in 1885, Doctor Emmet Brown is about to be killed by Buford 'Mad Dog' Tannen. Marty McFly travels back in time to save his friend.

title: The Grifters
description: A small-time conman has torn loyalties between his estranged mother and his new girlfriend, both of whom are high-stakes grifters with their own agendas.

title: Close-Up
description: Pretending to be filmmaker Mohsen Makhmalbaf, a man enters the home of a well-to-do family in Tehran, promising to feature them in his next movie.

title: Europa Europa
description: A boy in Nazi Germany, trying to conceal that he is Jewish, joins the Hitler Youth.

title: Days of Being Wild
description: A man tries to find out who his real mother is after the woman who raised him tells him the truth.

title: Metropolitan
description: A group of young upper-class Manhattanites are moving through the gala debutante season as an outsider joins them.

title: Slacker
description: A day in the life of Austin, Texas as the camera roams from place to place and provides a brief look at the overeducated, the social misfits, the outcasts and the oddballs.

title: Ju Dou
description: A woman married to the brutal and infertile owner of a dye mill falls in love with his nephew, but the consequences of their secret love are tragic.

title: Trust
description: A pregnant high school dropout bonds with an electronics repairman.

title: Dreams
description: A collection of magical tales based upon the actual dreams of director Akira Kurosawa.

title: An Angel at My Table
description: Based on the autobiographies of Janet Frame, the film follows the author from her childhood to her time in a mental institution, and her eventual success as a writer.

title: Rosencrantz & Guildenstern Are Dead
description: Two minor characters from the play 'Hamlet' stumble around unaware of their scripted lives and unable to deviate from them.

title: Bullet in the Head
description: Three friends start a life of crime in Hong Kong, but their loyalty is tested when they travel to Vietnam during the war to make a fortune in smuggling.

title: Tie Me Up! Tie Me Down!
description: An unbalanced but alluring mental patient kidnaps a porn star and holds her hostage in the hopes that she will fall in love with him.

title: Paris Is Burning
description: A chronicle of New York's drag scene in the 1980s, focusing on balls, voguing and the ambitions and dreams of those who gave the era its warmth and vitality.

title: Life Is Sweet
description: A working-class North London family deals with the ups and downs of everyday life, including the launch of a new business and the struggles of their two daughters.

title: Journey of Hope
description: A Turkish family sells all their possessions to make a perilous journey to Switzerland in search of a better life.

title: Longtime Companion
description: The first wide-release theatrical film to tackle the subject of AIDS follows a group of gay friends in New York City in the 1980s.

title: Tremors
description: Natives of a small isolated town defend themselves against strange underground creatures which are killing them one by one.

title: Pump Up the Volume
description: A shy teenager leads a double life as a popular pirate radio DJ who inspires a high school rebellion.

title: State of Grace
description: An undercover cop returns to his old neighborhood in Hell's Kitchen to infiltrate the Irish mob run by his best friend's brother.

title: To Sleep with Anger
description: A mysterious visitor from the South arrives at the home of a Los Angeles family and disrupts their lives with his old-fashioned ways and dark influence.

title: Avalon
description: A Polish-Jewish family comes to the US at the beginning of the 20th century. There, they work to make a future for themselves and for the next generations.

title: The Nasty Girl
description: A German high school student investigates her town's Nazi history for an essay contest, but encounters resistance from the locals who want to keep the past hidden.

title: Open Doors
description: In 1930s Fascist Italy, a judge tries to save a man who has committed a triple murder from the death penalty.

title: Dick Tracy
description: The comic strip detective finds his life vastly complicated when Breathless Mahoney makes advances towards him while he is trying to battle Big Boy Caprice's united mob.

title: Die Hard 2
description: John McClane attempts to avert disaster as rogue military operatives seize control of Dulles International Airport in Washington, D.C.

title: The Field
description: An Irish farmer fights for the land he has tended for years when an American developer tries to buy it.

title: Riff-Raff
description: A construction worker finds work and romance in London, but struggles with the harsh realities of working class life.

title: Taxi Blues
description: A Jewish jazz musician and a hard-working taxi driver form an unlikely friendship in Soviet Moscow.

title: Freeze Die Come to Life
description: Two children living in a remote Soviet mining town in 1947 struggle to survive in a harsh environment.

title: The Match Factory Girl
description: A lonely young woman who works at a match factory decides to take revenge on the people who have wronged her.

title: Korczak
description: The story of Janusz Korczak, a Jewish doctor and educator who ran an orphanage in the Warsaw Ghetto during World War II.

title: Interrogation
description: In 1950s Poland, a cabaret singer is arrested and imprisoned without explanation, where she is interrogated and tortured by the secret police.

title: Hidden Agenda
description: An American human rights lawyer investigates the murder of her boyfriend in Northern Ireland, uncovering a political conspiracy involving the British government.

title: Mountains of the Moon
description: The story of Captain Richard Francis Burton and Lt. John Hanning Speke's expedition to find the source of the Nile River.
